title: Laughing into the Fourth Dimension: 25 Humorous Fantasy & Science Fiction Stories
description: 25 Humorous Fantasy & Science Fiction Stories  Featuring many beloved tales including: A Law of Matter Ben Franklin's Time Machine Cloning the Babe Caesar's Shade Ariel Duel The Alien Abduction Caper Xaria Sisyphus Revisited Fink's Bar The Lady in the Bay The Cup-Bearer of Lethe
author: Larry Lefkowitz
